titles.title: A resolution honoring the memory of the fallen heroes of the Granite Mountain Interagency Hotshot Crew.
A resolution honoring the memory of the fallen heroes of the Granite Mountain Interagency Hotshot Crew.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Senate Committee on the Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and an amended preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
This resolution honors the memory of the fallen firefighters of the Granite Mountain Interagency Hotshot Crew of the Prescott, Arizona, Fire Department.
The resolution extends condolences to the surviving families of the 19 firefighters lost in the line of duty and commends their bravery and sacrifice.
